content.rendered:
Growave - Loyalty, Wishlist +3

Loyalty program rewards, referral, product reviews, gift cards

Growave is the all-in-one marketing platform that empowers your Shopify store with product reviews, wishlists, loyalty programs, referrals, social login, and UGC.

Best for small and medium-sized Shopify stores to have loyalty & rewards, reviews, wishlist, Instagram, and UGC from one place instead of several separate apps.

Benefits:

  • Built-in Growave integration in our themes
  • No manual coding adjustments
  • Automatically adjust Growave widget to theme structure

Promotion offer:

Growave will adopt a special offer for BullTheme’s users as follows:

Monthly Plans 30 days of free trial
Annually Plans Discount 20%

Condition of participation:

  • BullTheme users first time install Growave
  • Sellers activate coupon code via BullTheme’s referral link
  • Sellers meeting one of the above conditions can only join the program once.
App details
Get promotion
